testcase.classname: User should login the Adactin Application
testcase.name: To verify whether the check-outdate field accepts a later date than check in date - 102
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the adactin application............................passed Then User should Validate the login page....................................passed Then User enter the username "<username>" and password "<password>".........passed Then User enter the login button............................................passed Then User verify that correct username is displayed on the login page.......passed Then User should location as in test data "Sydney"..........................passed And User should hotel as in test data "Hotel Creek".........................passed And User should room type as in test data "Standard"........................passed And User should no-of-rooms as in test data "1".............................passed And User Enter check-in-date as in test data "05/06/2019"...................passed And User Enter check-out-date as in test data "03/06/2019"..................passed Then User Verify that system gives an error message for check in date.......passed Then User Verify that system gives an error message for check out date......passed Then User click the search button...........................................passed
